entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: TextSniper - OCR, Copy & Paste
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$11.99 ‚Üí $7.99 [$7.99 ~ $11.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

TextSniper is an easy-to-use desktop Mac OCR app that can extract and recognize any non-searchable and non-editable text on your Mac's screen. As an extra feature, it can turn OCR text into speech. It is a super convenient alternative to complicated optical character recognition tools. The tool is intuitive to use and makes extracting text from your images, scanned paper documents, PDFs, or even videos easy. No training or special skills are required, and it fits perfectly home and business Mac users. Easily accessible from the menu bar whenever you need it and has a simple user interface. If you have used a built-in Mac screen capture application before, it wouldn't be any trouble to work with TextSniper, too. Select with a mouse any part of an image, photo, PDF document, or anything on your screen, and the app will process and recognize any text within this selection. The text output will be saved into a clipboard so you can paste it into your favourite macOS text editing or note-taking software. Finally, the app's optical character recognition engine doesn't need an internet connection to process documents. Great OCR solution for those who are concerned about privacy. The application does not collect any users' data. Use Cases: ‚Ä¢ Convert different image formats to text (JPEG, PNG, GIF, TIFF, BMP, etc.). ‚Ä¢ Pull text from a non-searchable PDF file without a need to process the whole document. ‚Ä¢ Read text from images, PDF documents, photos, Zoom meetings, or any other sources. ‚Ä¢ Copy text even when it is uncopiable, like in ebooks or web articles. ‚Ä¢ Quickly extract emails, links, phone numbers, etc. ‚Ä¢ Grab text or turn it into speech in video games. ‚Ä¢ Read QR or barcodes. ‚Ä¢ Quickly generate alt text from the screenshot for tweets. Features: ‚Ä¢ On-device OCR technology. No internet connection is needed. ‚Ä¢ Instant text recognition. No need to upload files into the application. OCR document or file on the fly. ‚Ä¢ High accuracy and performance in processing any documents. ‚Ä¢ Recognizes even tiny text on images with low-quality or dense background. ‚Ä¢ Customizable. Custom keyboard shortcuts to extract text with various options. ‚Ä¢ You can have TextSniper speak the recognized text whenever you need it. ‚Ä¢ Supports optical character recognition in multiple languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Italian, Traditional and Simplified Chinese. ‚Ä¢ Running macOS Ventura: All the above languages plus Ukrainian, Korean, Japanese and Russian. ‚Ä¢ Running macOS Sonoma: All the above languages plus Thai and Vietnamese. ‚Ä¢ Running macOS Sequoia: All the above languages plus Arabic and Najdi Arabic. ‚Ä¢ Running macOS Catalina: English language only supported. ‚Ä¢ Use your iPad or iPhone camera to capture text from a photo or scanned document quickly. ‚Ä¢ Fully compatible with macOS Sonoma and optimised for Apple's M1-M3 chips.

entry.title: djay - DJ App & AI Mixer
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Full Access to PROÔºö$29.99 ‚Üí $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $29.99]

Application Description

*** Apple Design Award Winner 2024 *** Welcome to djay! The #1 DJ app and winner of multiple Apple Design Awards now integrates with Apple Music - mix over 100 million songs instantly! djay transforms your iOS device into a full-featured DJ system. Seamlessly integrated with your music library, djay allows you to mix your favorite songs and playlists. You can perform live, remix tracks, or enable Automix mode to let djay create a seamless mix for you automatically. Whether you are a professional DJ or a beginner who just loves to play with music, djay offers you the most intuitive yet powerful DJ experience on an iOS device. APPLE MUSIC INTEGRATION ‚Ä¢ Access to over 100 million songs ‚Ä¢ Match: recommendations based on the currently playing song ‚Ä¢ Your library: all your music seamlessly integrated ‚Ä¢ Listen Now and Charts integration ‚Ä¢ Discover new music and add songs to your Apple Music library right from within djay ‚Ä¢ Powerful search capabilities for the vast catalog of Apple Music ADVANCED MEDIA LIBRARY ‚Ä¢ Apple Music: 100+ million tracks, your personal library in the cloud (Apple Music subscription) ‚Ä¢ TIDAL: Millions of tracks, high quality sound (TIDAL DJ Extension) ‚Ä¢ SoundCloud: Millions of underground and premium tracks (SoundCloud Go+) ‚Ä¢ Beatport: Millions of electronic music tracks (Beatport Advanced Subscriptions) ‚Ä¢ Beatsource: Millions of open-format music tracks (Beatsource Subscription) ‚Ä¢ Files: access files in the cloud (e.g. Dropbox), on your iOS device, or on external hard drives seamlessly ‚Ä¢ My Collection: Powerful playlists management AUTOMIX ‚Ä¢ Automatic, beat-matched mixes ‚Ä¢ Queue and Playlist automation NEURAL MIX‚Ñ¢ ‚Ä¢ Isolate vocals, drums, and instrumentals in real-time (not supported with Apple Music) MUSIC PRODUCTION TOOLS ‚Ä¢ Sequencer: create beats on top of your music live ‚Ä¢ Looper: remix your music with up to 48 loops per track ‚Ä¢ Beat-matched sequencing of drums and samples ‚Ä¢ Extensive content library with hundreds of loops and samples. HARDWARE INTEGRATION ‚Ä¢ Plug-and-play integration with over 100 MIDI controllers by Pioneer DJ, Reloop, Hercules, Numark, Denon DJ, and more ‚Ä¢ Digital Vinyl System (DVS) Integration ‚Ä¢ Advanced MIDI Learn to map any class-compliant MIDI controller ‚Ä¢ Support for Bluetooth audio and MIDI ‚Ä¢ Support for multi-channel USB audio interfaces and video output POWERFUL AUDIO ENGINE ‚Ä¢ Ableton Link integration ‚Ä¢ Fluid Beatgrid ‚Ä¢ High-res waveforms BUILT FOR iOS ‚Ä¢ Accessible via VoiceOver ‚Ä¢ Airplay, Live Photos, Apple Watch, and iCloud integration ‚Ä¢ Haptic Feedback, Drag & Drop, Keyboard Shortcuts ‚Ä¢ Multi-Tasking: Slide Over and Split View support Top features of the optional Pro subscription include: ‚Ä¢ Unlimited access to an extensive library of samples, loops, FX, and visuals ‚Ä¢ Neural Mix‚Ñ¢ ‚Ä¢ Sampler & Looper ‚Ä¢ Automix ‚Ä¢ Crossfader FX ‚Ä¢ Video Mixing ‚Ä¢ Music Visualizers ‚Ä¢ Single Deck mode ‚Ä¢ 4-Deck mode ‚Ä¢ Advanced media library editing ‚Ä¢ Pre-cueing with headphones ‚Ä¢ Hardware integration (MIDI controllers, DVS, multi-channel audio interfaces) ‚Ä¢ 7-day free trial: free access to all djay Pro content and features for one week, cancel anytime The optional PRO subscription allows you to subscribe once and use djay Pro across all your Mac and iOS devices, including access to all PRO features, as well as 1000+ loops, samples, and visuals. A supported streaming subscription and an internet connection are required to access songs from a streaming service in djay. No recording available for streamed songs. Neural Mix cannot be used when streaming from Apple Music. Specific songs may not be available or accessible on your account or in your country. Streaming service availability and pricing may vary depending on country, currency and service.

entry.title: Vythm VJ - Music Visualizer DJ
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • All features and modesÔºö$44.99 ‚Üí $29.99 [$29.99 ~ $44.99]

Application Description

--- Experience Your Music with Vythm --- Unlock the potential of music visualization with Vythm! Vythm is a versatile music visualization app that allows you to create visual artworks in harmony with your selected music. It includes a variety of unique visualization modes, including Equalizer, Mandala, Shapes, Fluids, Psychedelic, Dreaming, and more. Choose a background and apply image effects to personalize your visualization completely. --- Your Vision, Your Visualization --- Vythm provides you with numerous options to realize your creative vision: - Over 100 carefully selected backgrounds. - MIDI input for precise visual control. - NDI streaming support for sharing your creations. - Real-time image effects like color correction, bloom, chromatic aberration, and more. - Size, rotation, and orientation adjustments. And much more! The Equalizer, Rhythm, and Peer modes are available for free, while other modes can be unlocked through a subscription. --- Input Formats --- Select your music from a variety of sources: - Import any mp3 or m4a files. - Access your iTunes library (Please note that Apple Music is not currently supported). - Utilize your device's microphone, with sensitivity adjustments for various use cases. - Enjoy three preselected songs for quick inspiration. --- Record Your Masterpiece --- Vythm offers a recording feature that enables you to share or save your creations.
